thread.title: Man shot in hand while walking along 122nd Avenue in SE Portland
thread.title_full: Man shot in hand while walking along 122nd Avenue in SE Portland | OregonLive.com

author: Andrew Theen | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Man shot in hand while walking along 122nd Avenue in SE Portland
text:
A 24-year-old man was shot in the hand Wednesday while walking along Portland's Southeast 122nd Avenue, the Portland Police Bureau announced.
The man suffered injuries that a police news release said did not threaten his life. He was taken to a hospital for treatment.
According to police, the victim was walking along 122 nd Avenue near Powell Boulevard in the Powellhurst-Gilbert neighborhood when he was unexpectedly hit in the hand by a bullet. Officers responded shortly after noon.
The man said he couldn't identify where the shot came from or who fired the bullet.
Police request that anyone with information about the shooting call detectives at 503-823-0400.
-- Andrew Theen
atheen@oregonian.com
503-294-4026
@cityhallwatch
